name: C O Z M I C B I R D Z
name_original: C O Z M I C B I R D Z
description:
Kill or race against your friends in this  simple locale multiplayer flying game with straight forward yet hard to learn hard to master controls.

In this game you cannot steer and gain altitude at the same time. You get to press a separate lift button to go up, meaning you have to choose between fighting gravity and steering every moment. 

Wired controller support, no Bluetooth yet. Although the controller input needs more testing and I have only tested it with dual-shock 4. Any testing with other controllers would be appreciated. 

This is not a finished product, and there are some known issues:

   - attempting to leave a match can cause the game to crash.

   - check point flags sometimes won't  respond

Help add to the list in the comments below!

I have not decided weather to continue development yet so please leave feed back and thoughts as well.
